verses.verse: I commend<WG4921> to you<WG5213> Phoebe,<WG5402> our<WG2257> sister,<WG79> who is<WG5607> a servant<WG1249> of the assembly<WG1577> that is<WG3588> at<WG1722> Cenchreae,<WG2747>

that<WG2443> you receive<WG4327> her<WG846> in<WG1722> the Lord,<WG2962> in a way worthy<WG516> of the saints,<WG40> and<WG2532> that<WG2443> you assist<WG3936> her<WG846> in<WG1722> <WG3739> whatever<WG302> matter<WG4229> she<WG846> may need<WG5535> from you,<WG5216> for<WG1063> she<WG846> herself<WG3778> also has been<WG1096> a helper of many,<WG4183> and<WG2532> <WG2532> of my<WG846> own self.<WG1700>
Greet<WG782> Prisca<WG4252> and<WG2532> Aquila,<WG207> my<WG3450> fellow workers<WG4904> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus,<WG2424>

who<WG3748> <WG5294> for<WG5228> my<WG3450> life,<WG5590> laid down<WG5294> their own<WG1438> necks;<WG5137> to whom<WG3739> not<WG3756> only<WG3441> I<WG1473> give thanks,<WG2168> but<WG235> also<WG2532> all<WG3956> the assemblies<WG1577> of the Gentiles.<WG1484>

<WG2532> Greet the assembly<WG1577> that is in<WG2596> their<WG846> house.<WG3624> Greet<WG782> Epaenetus,<WG1866> my<WG3450> beloved,<WG27> who<WG3739> is<WG2076> the first fruits<WG536> of Achaia<WG882> to<WG1519> Christ.<WG5547>
Greet<WG782> Mary,<WG3137> who<WG3748> <WG2872> labored<WG2872> much<WG4183> for<WG1519> us.<WG2248>

Greet<WG782> Andronicus<WG408> and<WG2532> Junia,<WG2458> my<WG3450> relatives<WG4773> and<WG2532> my<WG3450> fellow prisoners,<WG4869> who<WG3748> are<WG1526> notable<WG1978> among<WG1722> the apostles,<WG652> who<WG3739> also<WG2532> were<WG1096> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> before<WG4253> me.<WG1700>
Greet<WG782> Amplias,<WG291> my<WG3450> beloved<WG27> in<WG1722> the Lord.<WG2962>
Greet<WG782> Urbanus,<WG3773> our<WG2257> fellow worker<WG4904> in<WG1722> Christ,<WG5547> and<WG2532> Stachys,<WG4720> my<WG3450> beloved.<WG27>
Greet<WG782> Apelles,<WG559> the approved<WG1384> in<WG1722> Christ.<WG5547> Greet<WG782> those who are<WG3588> of<WG1537> the household of Aristobulus.<WG711>
Greet<WG782> Herodion,<WG2267> my<WG3450> kinsman.<WG4773> Greet<WG782> them<WG3488> of<WG1537> the<WG3488> household of Narcissus,<WG3488> who are<WG3588> in<WG1722> the Lord.<WG2962>

Greet<WG782> Tryphaena<WG5170> and<WG2532> Tryphosa,<WG5173> who labor<WG2872> in<WG1722> the Lord.<WG2962> Greet<WG782> Persis,<WG4069> the beloved,<WG27> who<WG3748> labored<WG2872> much<WG4183> in<WG1722> the Lord.<WG2962>
Greet<WG782> Rufus,<WG4504> the chosen<WG1588> in<WG1722> the Lord,<WG2962> and<WG2532> his<WG846> mother<WG3384> and<WG2532> mine.<WG1700>
Greet<WG782> Asyncritus,<WG799> Phlegon,<WG5393> Hermes,<WG2060> Patrobas,<WG3969> Hermas,<WG2057> and<WG2532> the brothers<WG80> who are with<WG4862> them.<WG846>

Greet<WG782> Philologus<WG5378> and<WG2532> Julia,<WG2456> Nereus<WG3517> and<WG2532> his<WG846> sister,<WG79> and<WG2532> Olympas,<WG3652> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the saints<WG40> who are with<WG4862> them.<WG846>
Greet<WG782> one another<WG240> with<WG1722> a<WG5370> holy<WG40> kiss.<WG5370> The assemblies<WG1577> of Christ<WG5547> greet<WG782> you.<WG5209>

Now<WG1161> I beg<WG3870> you,<WG5209> brothers,<WG80> look<WG4648> out for those who are causing<WG4160> the divisions<WG1370> and<WG2532> occasions of stumbling,<WG4625> contrary to<WG3844> the doctrine<WG1322> which<WG3739> you<WG5210> learned,<WG3129> and<WG2532> turn away<WG1578> from<WG575> them.<WG846>

For<WG1063> those who are such<WG5108> don't<WG3756> serve<WG1398> our<WG2257> Lord,<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> but<WG235> their own<WG1438> belly;<WG2836> and<WG2532> by<WG1223> their smooth<WG5542> and<WG2532> flattering speech,<WG2129> they deceive<WG1818> the hearts<WG2588> of the innocent.<WG172>

For<WG1063> your<WG5216> obedience<WG5218> has become known to<WG1519> all.<WG3956> I rejoice<WG5463> therefore<WG3767> over<WG1909> you.<WG5213> <WG1909> But<WG1161> I desire<WG2309> to have<WG2309> <WG1511> you<WG5209> wise<WG4680> in<WG1519> that which is good,<WG18> but<WG1161> innocent<WG185> in that<WG1519> which is evil.<WG2556>

And<WG1161> the God<WG2316> of peace<WG1515> will<WG1722> quickly<WG5034> crush<WG4937> Satan<WG4567> under<WG5259> your<WG5216> feet.<WG4228> The grace<WG5485> of<WG2962> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> be with<WG3326> you.<WG5216>
Timothy,<WG5095> my<WG3450> fellow worker,<WG4904> greets<WG782> you,<WG5209> as do Lucius,<WG3066> Jason,<WG2394> and<WG2532> Sosipater,<WG4989> my<WG3450> relatives.<WG4773>
I,<WG1473> Tertius,<WG5060> who write<WG1125> the letter,<WG1992> greet<WG782> you<WG5209> in<WG1722> the Lord.<WG2962>

Gaius,<WG1050> my<WG3450> host<WG3581> and<WG2532> host of the<WG1577> whole<WG3650> assembly,<WG1577> greets you.<WG5209> Erastus,<WG2037> the<WG1577> treasurer<WG3623> of the city,<WG4172> greets<WG782> you,<WG5209> as<WG2532> does Quartus,<WG2890> the brother.<WG80>
The grace<WG5485> of<WG2962> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> be with<WG3326> you<WG5216> all!<WG3956> Amen.<WG281>
